talentList.name: Deep Wounds
talentList.description: Your critical strikes cause the opponent to bleed, dealing v0% of your melee weapon's average damage over 12 sec.

talentList.name: Sword Specialization
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.

talentList.name: Improved Heroic Strike
talentList.description: Reduces the cost of your Heroic Strike ability by v0 rage point.

talentList.name: Mace Specialization
talentList.description: Gives your melee attacks a chance to stun your target for 3 sec and generate 7 rage when using a Mace.

talentList.name: Improved Charge
talentList.description: Increases the amount of rage generated by your Charge ability by v0.

talentList.name: Improved Rend
talentList.description: Increases the bleed damage done by your Rend ability by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Thunder Clap
talentList.description: Reduces the cost of your Thunder Clap ability by v0 rage point and increases the damage by v1% and the slowing effect by an additional v2%.

talentList.name: Improved Hamstring
talentList.description: Gives your Hamstring ability a v0% chance to immobilize the target for 5 sec.

talentList.name: Deflection
talentList.description: Increases your Parry chance by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Overpower
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Overpower ability by v0%.

talentList.name: Poleaxe Specialization
talentList.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by v0%.

talentList.name: Death Wish
talentList.description: When activated, increases your physical damage by 20% and makes you immune to Fear effects, but increases all damage taken by 5%. Lasts 30 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Intercept
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Mortal Strike
talentList.description: A vicious strike that deals weapon damage plus 85 and wounds the target, reducing the effectiveness of any healing by 50% for 10 sec.

talentList.name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
talentList.description: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by v0%.

talentList.name: Anger Management
talentList.description: Generates 1 rage per 3 seconds while in combat.

talentList.name: Iron Will
talentList.description: Increases your chance to resist stun and charm effects by v0%.

talentList.name: Impale
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your abilities in Battle, Defensive, and Berserker stance by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Disciplines
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Retaliation, Recklessness and Shield Wall abilities by v0 min and increases their duration by v1 sec.

talentList.name: Blood Frenzy
talentList.description: Your Rend and Deep Wounds abilities also increase all melee damage caused to that target by v0%.

talentList.name: Second Wind
talentList.description: Whenever you are struck by a Stun or Immobilize effect you will generate v0 rage and v1% of your total health over 10 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Mortal Strike
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Mortal Strike ability by v0 sec and increases the damage it causes by v1%.

talentList.name: Endless Rage
talentList.description: You generate 25% more rage from damage dealt.

talentList.name: Commanding Presence
talentList.description: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout and the health bonus of your Commanding Shout by v0%.

talentList.name: Enrage
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% melee damage bonus for 12 sec up to a maximum of 12 swings after being the victim of a critical strike.

talentList.name: Flurry
talentList.description: Increases your attack speed by v0% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike.

talentList.name: Cruelty
talentList.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by v0%.

talentList.name: Booming Voice
talentList.description: Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout, Demoralizing Shout, and Commanding Shout by v0%.

talentList.name: Unbridled Wrath
talentList.description: Gives you a chance to generate an additional rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon.

talentList.name: Piercing Howl
talentList.description: Causes all enemies near the warrior to be dazed, reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Demoralizing Shout
talentList.description: Increases the melee attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by v0%.

talentList.name: Sweeping Strikes
talentList.description: Your next 10 melee weapon swings strike an additional nearby opponent.

talentList.name: Improved Cleave
talentList.description: Increases the bonus damage done by your Cleave ability by v0%.

talentList.name: Bloodthirst
talentList.description: Instantly attack the target causing 511 damage. In addition, the next 5 successful melee attacks will restore 10 health. This effect lasts 8 sec. Damage is based on your attack power.

talentList.name: Improved Slam
talentList.description: Decreases the casting time of your Slam ability by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Blood Craze
talentList.description: Regenerates v0% of your total health over 6 sec after being the victim of a critical strike.

talentList.name: Improved Berserker Rage
talentList.description: The Berserker Rage ability will generate v0 rage when used.

talentList.name: Improved Execute
talentList.description: Reduces the Rage cost of your Execute ability by v0.

talentList.name: Weapon Mastery
talentList.description: Reduces the chance for you attacks to be dodged by v0% and reduces the duration of all Disarm effects used against you by v1%. This does not stack with other Disarm duration reducing effects.

talentList.name: Dual Wield Specialization
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by v0%.

talentList.name: Precision
talentList.description: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Whirlwind
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Whirlwind ability by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Berserker Stance
talentList.description: Increases attack power by v0% and reduces threat caused by v1% while in Berserker Stance.

talentList.name: Rampage
talentList.description: Warrior goes on a rampage, increasing attack power by 30 and causing most successful melee attacks to increase attack power by an additional 30. This effect will stack up to 5 times. Lasts 30 sec. This ability can only be used after scoring a critical hit.

talentList.name: Anticipation
talentList.description: Increases your Defense skill by v0.

talentList.name: Toughness
talentList.description: Increases your armor value from items by v0%.

talentList.name: Tactical Mastery
talentList.description: You retain up to an additional v0 of your rage points when you change stances. Also greatly increases the threat generated by your Bloodthirst and Mortal Strike abilities when you are in Defensive Stance.

talentList.name: Improved Bloodrage
talentList.description: Increases the instant rage generated by your Bloodrage ability by v0.

talentList.name: Improved Taunt
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Taunt ability by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Defiance
talentList.description: Increases the threat generated by your attacks by v0% while in Defensive Stance and increases your expertise by v1.

talentList.name: Improved Shield Block
talentList.description: Allows your Shield Block ability to block an additional attack, and increases the duration by 1 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Sunder Armor
talentList.description: Reduces the cost of your Sunder Armor and Devastate abilities by v0 rage point.

talentList.name: Improved Revenge
talentList.description: Gives your Revenge ability a v0% chance to stun the target for 3 sec.

talentList.name: Shield Slam
talentList.description: Slam the target with your shield, causing 225 to 235 damage, modified by your shield bloc value, and dispels 1 magic effect on the target. Also causes a high amount of threat.

talentList.name: Improved Shield Bash
talentList.description: Gives your Shield Bash ability a v0% chance to silence the target for 3 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Shield Wall
talentList.description: Increases the effect duration of your Shield Wall ability by v0 secs.

talentList.name: Improved Disarm
talentList.description: Increases the duration of your Disarm ability by v0 secs.

talentList.name: Concussion Blow
talentList.description: Stuns the opponent for 5 sec.

talentList.name: Last Stand
talentList.description: When activated, this ability temporarily grants you 30% of your maximum hit points for 20 sec. After the effect expires, the hit points are lost.

talentList.name: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
talentList.description: Increases the damage you deal with One-Handed Melee weapons by v0%.

talentList.name: Shield Specialization
talentList.description: Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by v0% and has a v1% chance to generate 1 rage when a block occurs.

talentList.name: Shield Mastery
talentList.description: Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your shield by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Defensive Stance
talentList.description: Reduces all spell damage taken while in Defensive Stance by v0%.

talentList.name: Focused Rage
talentList.description: Reduces the rage cost of your offensive abilities by v0.

talentList.name: Vitality
talentList.description: Increases your total Stamina by v0% and your total Strength by v1%.

talentList.name: Devastate
talentList.description: Sunder the target's armor causing the Sunder Armor effect. In addition, causes 50% of weapon damage plus 15 for each application of Sunder Armor on the target. The Sunder Armor effect can stack up to 5 times.
